original: 03,011.030c dṛṣṭvā duryodhanaṃ rājan maitreyaṃ kopa āviśat
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā duryodhanam rājan maitreyam kopaḥ āviśat
sa kopa vaśam āpannaḥ maitreyaḥ muni sattamaḥ

original: 03,011.031c vidhinā saṃprayuktaś ca śāpāyāsya mano dadhe
analyzed: vidhinā saṃprayuktaḥ ca śāpāya asya manaḥ dadhe
tatas sa vāri upaspṛśya kopa saṃrakta locanaḥ
maitreyaḥ dhārtarāṣṭram tam aśapat duṣṭa cetasam

original: 03,011.033a yasmāt tvaṃ mām anādṛtya nemāṃ vācaṃ cikīrṣasi
analyzed: yasmāt tvam mām an ādṛtya na imām vācam cikīrṣasi
tasmāt asya abhimānasya sadyas phalam avāpnuhi
tvad abhidroha saṃyuktam yuddham utpatsyate mahat

original: 03,011.034c yatra bhīmo gadāpātais tavoruṃ bhetsyate balī
analyzed: yatra bhīmaḥ gadā pātaiḥ tava ūrum bhetsyate balī

original: 03,011.035a ity evam ukte vacane dhṛtarāṣṭro mahīpatiḥ
analyzed: iti evam ukte vacane dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ mahīpatiḥ

original: 03,011.035c prasādayām āsa muniṃ naitad evaṃ bhaved iti
analyzed: prasādayām āsa munim na etat evam bhavet iti
maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: 03,011.036a śamaṃ yāsyati cet putras tava rājan yathā tathā
analyzed: śamam yāsyati ced putraḥ tava rājan yathā tathā

original: 03,011.036c śāpo na bhavitā tāta viparīte bhaviṣyati
analyzed: śāpaḥ na bhavitā tāta viparīte bhaviṣyati
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca

original: 03,011.037a sa vilakṣas tu rājendra duryodhanapitā tadā
analyzed: sa vilakṣaḥ tu rāja indra duryodhana pitā tadā

original: 03,011.037c maitreyaṃ prāha kirmīraḥ kathaṃ bhīmena pātitaḥ
analyzed: maitreyam prāha kirmīraḥ katham bhīmena pātitaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca

original: 03,011.038a nāhaṃ vakṣyāmy asūyā te na te śuśrūṣate sutaḥ
analyzed: na aham vakṣyāmi asūyā te na te śuśrūṣate sutaḥ

original: 03,011.038c eṣa te viduraḥ sarvam ākhyāsyati gate mayi
analyzed: eṣa te viduraḥ sarvam ākhyāsyati gate mayi
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca

original: 03,011.039a ity evam uktvā maitreyaḥ prātiṣṭhata yathāgatam
analyzed: iti evam uktvā maitreyaḥ prātiṣṭhata yathāgatam
kirmīra vadha saṃvignaḥ bahis duryodhanaḥ gamat
dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ uvāca

original: 03,012.001a kirmīrasya vadhaṃ kṣattaḥ śrotum icchāmi kathyatām
analyzed: kirmīrasya vadham kṣattar śrotum icchāmi kathyatām
rakṣasā bhīmasenasya katham āsīt samāgamaḥ
viduraḥ uvāca
śṛṇu bhīmasya karma idam ati mānuṣa karmaṇaḥ

original: 03,012.002c śrutapūrvaṃ mayā teṣāṃ kathānteṣu punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: śruta pūrvam mayā teṣām kathā anteṣu punar punar
yam jaghāna ekacakrāyām bhīmaḥ bhīma parākramaḥ
rākṣasam krodha tāmra akṣam darpa utsiktam bala adhikam
tasya bhrātā mahā vīryaḥ kanīyān uru vikramaḥ
bhrātṛ nāśa samutthena channaḥ vyasana bhasmanā
bhīmasena antara prepsuḥ cacāra pṛthivīm imām
sa nirjitān upāśrauṣīt pāṇḍavān anulakṣaye
itas prayātāḥ rāja indra pāṇḍavāḥ dyūta nirjitāḥ

original: 03,012.003c jagmus tribhir ahorātraiḥ kāmyakaṃ nāma tad vanam
analyzed: jagmuḥ tribhiḥ ahorātraiḥ kāmyakam nāma tat vanam
rātrau niśīthe svābhīle gate ṛdha samaye nṛpa
pracāre puruṣādānām rakṣasām bhīma karmaṇām

original: 03,012.005a tad vanaṃ tāpasā nityaṃ śeṣāś ca vanacāriṇaḥ
analyzed: tat vanam tāpasāḥ nityam śeṣāḥ ca vana cāriṇaḥ
dūrāt pariharanti sma puruṣāda bhayāt kila

original: 03,012.006a teṣāṃ praviśatāṃ tatra mārgam āvṛtya bhārata
analyzed: teṣām praviśatām tatra mārgam āvṛtya bhārata
dīpta akṣam bhīṣaṇam rakṣaḥ sa ulmukam pratyadṛśyata

original: 03,012.007a bāhū mahāntau kṛtvā tu tathāsyaṃ ca bhayānakam
analyzed: bāhū mahāntau kṛtvā tu tathā āsyam ca bhayānakam

original: 03,012.007c sthitam āvṛtya panthānaṃ yena yānti kurūdvahāḥ
analyzed: sthitam āvṛtya panthānam yena yānti kuru udvahāḥ
daṣṭa uṣṭha daṃṣṭram tāmra akṣam pradīpta ūrdhva śiroruham
sa arka raśmi taḍit cakram sa balākam iva ambudam
sṛjantam rākṣasīm māyām mahā rāva virāviṇam

original: 03,012.009c muñcantaṃ vipulaṃ nādaṃ satoyam iva toyadam
analyzed: muñcantam vipulam nādam sa toyam iva toyadam
tasya nādena saṃtrastāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ sarvatodiśam
vimukta nādāḥ saṃpetuḥ sthala jāḥ jala jaiḥ saha
saṃpradruta mṛga dvīpi mahiṣa ṛkṣa samākulam

original: 03,012.011c tad vanaṃ tasya nādena saṃprasthitam ivābhavat
analyzed: tat vanam tasya nādena saṃprasthitam iva abhavat
tasya ūru vāta abhihatā tāmra pallava bāhavaḥ
vidūra jātāḥ ca latāḥ samāśliṣyanta pādapān
tasmin kṣaṇe pravavau mārutaḥ bhṛśa dāruṇaḥ

original: 03,012.013c rajasā saṃvṛtaṃ tena naṣṭarṣkam abhavan nabhaḥ
analyzed: rajasā saṃvṛtam tena naṣṭa ṛṣkam abhavat nabhaḥ
pañcānām pāṇḍu putrāṇām a vijñātaḥ mahā ripuḥ
pañcānām indriyāṇām tu śoka vegaḥ iva atulaḥ
sa dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavān dūrāt kṛṣṇājina samāvṛtān

original: 03,012.015c āvṛṇot tad vanadvāraṃ maināka iva parvataḥ
analyzed: āvṛṇot tat vana dvāram mainākaḥ iva parvataḥ
tam samāsādya vitrastā kṛṣṇā kamala locanā
a dṛṣṭa pūrvam saṃtrāsāt nyamīlayata locane
duḥśāsana kara utsṛṣṭa viprakīrṇa śiroruhā
pañca parvata madhya sthā nadī iva ākula tām gatā

original: 03,012.018a momuhyamānāṃ tāṃ tatra jagṛhuḥ pañca pāṇḍavāḥ
analyzed: momuhyamānām tām tatra jagṛhuḥ pañca pāṇḍavāḥ
indriyāṇi prasaktāni viṣayeṣu yathā ratim

original: 03,012.019a atha tāṃ rākṣasīṃ māyām utthitāṃ ghoradarśanām
analyzed: atha tām rākṣasīm māyām utthitām ghora darśanām
rakṣaḥ ghnaiḥ vividhaiḥ mantraiḥ dhaumyaḥ samyak prayojitaiḥ
paśyatām pāṇḍu putrāṇām nāśayām āsa vīryavān
sa naṣṭa māyaḥ ti balaḥ krodha visphārita īkṣaṇaḥ
kāma mūrti dharaḥ kṣudraḥ kāla kalpaḥ vyadṛśyata

original: 03,012.021a tam uvāca tato rājā dīrghaprajño yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
analyzed: tam uvāca tatas rājā dīrgha prajñaḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: 03,012.021c ko bhavān kasya vā kiṃ te kriyatāṃ kāryam ucyatām
analyzed: kaḥ bhavān kasya vā kim te kriyatām kāryam ucyatām
pratyuvāca atha tat rakṣaḥ dharmarājam yudhiṣṭhiram

original: 03,012.022c ahaṃ bakasya vai bhrātā kirmīra iti viśrutaḥ
analyzed: aham bakasya vai bhrātā kirmīraḥ iti viśrutaḥ
paiṭhīna gotre utpannaḥ nāstikaḥ veda nindakaḥ
vane smin kāmyake śūnye nivasāmi gata jvaraḥ

original: 03,012.023c yudhi nirjitya puruṣān āhāraṃ nityam ācaran
analyzed: yudhi nirjitya puruṣān āhāram nityam ācaran

original: 03,012.024a ke yūyam iha saṃprāptā bhakṣyabhūtā mamāntikam
analyzed: ke yūyam iha saṃprāptāḥ bhakṣya bhūtāḥ mama antikam

original: 03,012.024c yudhi nirjitya vaḥ sarvān bhakṣayiṣye gatajvaraḥ
analyzed: yudhi nirjitya vaḥ sarvān bhakṣayiṣye gata jvaraḥ

original: 03,012.025a yudhiṣṭhiras tu tac chrutvā vacas tasya durātmanaḥ
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ tu tat śrutvā vacaḥ tasya durātmanaḥ
ācacakṣe tatas sarvam gotra nāma ādi bhārata

original: 03,012.026a pāṇḍavo dharmarājo 'haṃ yadi te śrotram āgataḥ
analyzed: pāṇḍavaḥ dharmarājaḥ ham yadi te śrotram āgataḥ
sahitaḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ sarvaiḥ bhīmasena arjuna ādibhiḥ

original: 03,012.027a hṛtarājyo vane vāsaṃ vastuṃ kṛtamatis tataḥ
analyzed: hṛta rājyaḥ vane vāsam vastum kṛtamatiḥ tatas

original: 03,012.027c vanam abhyāgato ghoram idaṃ tava parigraham
analyzed: vanam abhyāgataḥ ghoram idam tava parigraham

original: 03,012.028a kirmīras tv abravīd enaṃ diṣṭyā devair idaṃ mama
analyzed: kirmīraḥ tu abravīt enam diṣṭyā devaiḥ idam mama
upapāditam adyā iha cira kālāt manogatam
vismayam paramam gatvā rākṣasaḥ ghora darśanaḥ
bhīmasena vadha artham hi nityam abhyudyata āyudhaḥ

original: 03,012.029c carāmi pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ nainam āsādayāmy aham
analyzed: carāmi pṛthivīm kṛtsnām na enam āsādayāmi aham

original: 03,012.030a so 'yam āsādito diṣṭyā bhrātṛhā kāṅkṣitaś ciram
analyzed: saḥ yam āsāditaḥ diṣṭyā bhrātṛ hā kāṅkṣitaḥ ciram

original: 03,012.030c anena hi mama bhrātā bako vinihataḥ priyaḥ
analyzed: anena hi mama bhrātā bakaḥ vinihataḥ priyaḥ
vetrakīyagṛhe rājan brāhmaṇa chadma rūpiṇā

original: 03,012.031c vidyābalam upāśritya na hy asty asyaurasaṃ balam
analyzed: vidyā balam upāśritya na hi asti asya aurasam balam

original: 03,012.032a hiḍimbaś ca sakhā mahyaṃ dayito vanagocaraḥ
analyzed: hiḍimbaḥ ca sakhā mahyam dayitaḥ vana gocaraḥ

original: 03,012.032c hato durātmanānena svasā cāsya hṛtā purā
analyzed: hataḥ durātmanā anena svasā ca asya hṛtā purā

original: 03,012.033a so 'yam abhyāgato mūḍho mamedaṃ gahanaṃ vanam
analyzed: saḥ yam abhyāgataḥ mūḍhaḥ mama idam gahanam vanam
pracāra samaye smākam ardharātre samāsthite
adya asya yātayiṣyāmi tat vairam cira saṃbhṛtam
tarpayiṣyāmi ca bakam rudhireṇa asya bhūriṇā

original: 03,012.035a adyāham anṛṇo bhūtvā bhrātuḥ sakhyus tathaiva ca
analyzed: adya aham anṛṇaḥ bhūtvā bhrātuḥ sakhyuḥ tathā eva ca
śāntim labdhāsmi paramām hatvā rākṣasa kaṇṭakam

original: 03,012.036a yadi tena purā mukto bhīmaseno bakena vai
analyzed: yadi tena purā muktaḥ bhīmasenaḥ bakena vai
adya enam bhakṣayiṣyāmi paśyataḥ te yudhiṣṭhira

original: 03,012.037a enaṃ hi vipulaprāṇam adya hatvā vṛkodaram
analyzed: enam hi vipula prāṇam adya hatvā vṛkodaram
saṃbhakṣya jarayiṣyāmi yathā agastyaḥ mahā asuram

original: 03,012.038a evam uktas tu dharmātmā satyasaṃdho yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu dharma ātmā satya saṃdhaḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: 03,012.038c naitad astīti sakrodho bhartsayām āsa rākṣasam
analyzed: na etat asti iti sa krodhaḥ bhartsayām āsa rākṣasam

original: 03,012.039a tato bhīmo mahābāhur ārujya tarasā druma
analyzed: tatas bhīmaḥ mahā bāhuḥ ārujya tarasā druma
daśa vyāmam iva udviddham niṣpatram akarot tadā
cakāra sajyam gāṇḍīvam vajra niṣpeṣa gauravam
nimeṣa antara mātreṇa tathā eva vijayaḥ rjunaḥ

original: 03,012.041a nivārya bhīmo jiṣṇuṃ tu tad rakṣo ghoradarśanam
analyzed: nivārya bhīmaḥ jiṣṇum tu tat rakṣaḥ ghora darśanam
abhidrutya abravīt vākyam tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti bhārata

original: 03,012.042a ity uktvainam abhikruddhaḥ kakṣyām utpīḍya pāṇḍavaḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā enam abhikruddhaḥ kakṣyām utpīḍya pāṇḍavaḥ
niṣpiṣya pāṇinā pāṇim saṃdaṣṭa uṣṭha puṭaḥ balī

original: 03,012.042e tam abhyadhāvad vegena bhīmo vṛkṣāyudhas tadā
analyzed: tam abhyadhāvat vegena bhīmaḥ vṛkṣāyudhaḥ tadā
yama daṇḍa pratīkāśam tatas tam tasya mūrdhani

original: 03,012.043c pātayām āsa vegena kuliśaṃ maghavān iva
analyzed: pātayām āsa vegena kuliśam maghavān iva

original: 03,012.044a asaṃbhrāntaṃ tu tad rakṣaḥ samare pratyadṛśyata
analyzed: asaṃbhrāntam tu tat rakṣaḥ samare pratyadṛśyata

original: 03,012.044c cikṣepa colmukaṃ dīptam aśaniṃ jvalitām iva
analyzed: cikṣepa ca ulmukam dīptam aśanim jvalitām iva

original: 03,012.045a tad udastam alātaṃ tu bhīmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: tat udastam alātam tu bhīmaḥ praharatām varaḥ

original: 03,012.045c padā savyena cikṣepa tad rakṣaḥ punar āvrajat
analyzed: padā savyena cikṣepa tat rakṣaḥ punar āvrajat

original: 03,012.046a kirmīraś cāpi sahasā vṛkṣam utpāṭya pāṇḍavam
analyzed: kirmīraḥ ca api sahasā vṛkṣam utpāṭya pāṇḍavam
daṇḍapāṇiḥ iva kruddhaḥ samare pratyayudhyata
tat vṛkṣa yuddham abhavat mahīruha vināśanam
vāli sugrīvayoḥ bhrātroḥ yathā śrī kāṅkṣiṇoḥ purā

original: 03,012.048a śīrṣayoḥ patitā vṛkṣā bibhidur naikadhā tayoḥ
analyzed: śīrṣayoḥ patitāḥ vṛkṣāḥ bibhiduḥ na ekadhā tayoḥ
yathā eva utpala padmāni mattayoḥ dvipayoḥ tathā
muñja vat jarjarībhūtāḥ bahavaḥ tatra pādapāḥ
cīrāṇi iva vyudastāni rejuḥ tatra mahā vane

original: 03,012.050a tad vṛkṣayuddham abhavat sumuhūrtaṃ viśāṃ pate
analyzed: tat vṛkṣa yuddham abhavat su muhūrtam viśām pate

original: 03,012.050c rākṣasānāṃ ca mukhyasya narāṇām uttamasya ca
analyzed: rākṣasānām ca mukhyasya narāṇām uttamasya ca

original: 03,012.051a tataḥ śilāṃ samutkṣipya bhīmasya yudhi tiṣṭhataḥ
analyzed: tatas śilām samutkṣipya bhīmasya yudhi tiṣṭhataḥ

original: 03,012.051c prāhiṇod rākṣasaḥ kruddho bhīmasenaś cacāla ha
analyzed: prāhiṇot rākṣasaḥ kruddhaḥ bhīmasenaḥ cacāla ha
tam śilā tāḍana jaḍam paryadhāvat sa rākṣasaḥ
bāhu vikṣipta kiraṇaḥ svarbhānuḥ iva bhāskaram
tau anyonyam samāśliṣya prakarṣantau parasparam

original: 03,012.053c ubhāv api cakāśete prayuddhau vṛṣabhāv iva
analyzed: ubhau api cakāśete prayuddhau vṛṣabhau iva
tayoḥ āsīt su tumulaḥ saṃprahāraḥ su dāruṇaḥ
nakha daṃṣṭra āyudhavatoḥ vyāghrayoḥ iva dṛptayoḥ
duryodhana nikārāt ca bāhu vīryāt ca darpitaḥ
kṛṣṇā nayana dṛṣṭaḥ ca vyavardhata vṛkodaraḥ
abhipatya atha bāhubhyām pratyagṛhṇāt amarṣitaḥ
mātaṅgaḥ iva mātaṅgam prabhinna karaṭāmukhaḥ

original: 03,012.057a taṃ cāpy ātha tato rakṣaḥ pratijagrāha vīryavān
analyzed: tam ca api ātha tatas rakṣaḥ pratijagrāha vīryavān

original: 03,012.057c tam ākṣipad bhīmaseno balena balināṃ varaḥ
analyzed: tam ākṣipat bhīmasenaḥ balena balinām varaḥ
tayoḥ bhuja viniṣpeṣāt ubhayoḥ balinoḥ tadā
śabdaḥ samabhavat ghoraḥ veṇu sphoṭa samaḥ yudhi

original: 03,012.059a athainam ākṣipya balād gṛhya madhye vṛkodaraḥ
analyzed: athā enam ākṣipya balāt gṛhya madhye vṛkodaraḥ

original: 03,012.059c dhūnayām āsa vegena vāyuś caṇḍa iva drumam
analyzed: dhūnayām āsa vegena vāyuḥ caṇḍaḥ iva drumam

original: 03,012.060a sa bhīmena parāmṛṣṭo durbalo balinā raṇe
analyzed: sa bhīmena parāmṛṣṭaḥ durbalaḥ balinā raṇe
vyaspandata yathāprāṇam vicakarṣa ca pāṇḍavam
tatas enam pariśrāntam upalabhya vṛkodaraḥ

original: 03,012.061c yoktrayām āsa bāhubhyāṃ paśuṃ raśanayā yathā
analyzed: āsa bāhubhyām paśum raśanayā yathā
vinadantam mahā nādam bhinna bherī sama svanam
bhrāmayām āsa su ciram visphurantam acetasam
tam viṣīdantam ājñāya rākṣasam pāṇḍu nandanaḥ
pragṛhya tarasā dorbhyām paśumāram amārayat
ākramya sa kaṭī deśe jānunā rākṣasa adhamam
apīḍayata bāhubhyām kaṇṭham tasya vṛkodaraḥ
atha tam jaḍa sarva aṅgam vyāvṛtta nayana ulbaṇam

original: 03,012.065c bhūtale pātayām āsa vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
analyzed: bhū tale pātayām āsa vākyam ca idam uvāca ha
hiḍimba bakayoḥ pāpa na tvam aśru pramārjanam

original: 03,012.066c kariṣyasi gataś cāsi yamasya sadanaṃ prati
analyzed: kariṣyasi gataḥ ca asi yamasya sadanam prati
iti evam uktvā puruṣa pravīraḥ
tam rākṣasam krodha vivṛtta netraḥ
prasrasta vastra ābharaṇam sphurantam
udbhrānta cittam vyasum utsasarja
tasmin hate toyada tulya rūpe
kṛṣṇām puraskṛtya narendra putrāḥ
bhīmam praśasya atha guṇaiḥ anekaiḥ
hṛṣṭāḥ tatas dvaitavanāya jagmuḥ
evam vinihataḥ saṃkhye kirmīraḥ manuja adhipa
bhīmena vacanāt tasya dharmarājasya kaurava

original: 03,012.070a tato niṣkaṇṭakaṃ kṛtvā vanaṃ tad aparājitaḥ
analyzed: tatas niṣkaṇṭakam kṛtvā vanam tat aparājitaḥ

original: 03,012.070c draupadyā saha dharmajño vasatiṃ tām uvāsa ha
analyzed: draupadyā saha dharma jñaḥ vasatim tām uvāsa ha

original: 03,012.071a samāśvāsya ca te sarve draupadīṃ bharatarṣabhāḥ

analyzed: abhighnantaḥ bhṛśam vīrāḥ mama cetaḥ vyakampayan

aham tadā vīra mahā vimarde

original: 03,022.029c na tatra saubhaṃ na ripuṃ na śālvaṃ;
analyzed: na tatra saubham na ripum na śālvam
paśyāmi vṛddham pitaram na ca api

original: 03,022.030a tato mamāsīn manasi māyeyam iti niścitam
analyzed: tatas mama āsīt manasi māyā iyam iti niścitam

original: 03,022.030c prabuddho 'smi tato bhūyaḥ śataśo vikirañ śarān
analyzed: prabuddhaḥ smi tatas bhūyas śataśas vikiram śarān
vāsudevaḥ uvāca
tatas ham bharata śreṣṭha pragṛhya ruciram dhanuḥ
śaraiḥ apātayam saubhāt śirāṃsi vibudha dviṣām
śarān ca āśīviṣa ākārān ūrdhva gān tigma tejasaḥ
apraiṣam śālva rājāya śārṅga muktān su vāsasaḥ
tatas na adṛśyata tadā saubham kuru kula udvaha
antarhitam māyayā abhūt tatas ham vismitaḥ bhavam
atha dānava saṃghāḥ te vikṛta ānana mūrdhajāḥ
udakrośan mahā rāja viṣṭhite mayi bhārata
tatas stram śabdasāham vai tvaramāṇaḥ mahā āhave
ayojayam tad vadhāya tatas śabdaḥ upāramat

original: 03,023.006a hatās te dānavāḥ sarve yaiḥ sa śabda udīritaḥ
analyzed: hatāḥ te dānavāḥ sarve yaiḥ sa śabdaḥ udīritaḥ
śaraiḥ āditya saṃkāśaiḥ jvalitaiḥ śabda sādhanaiḥ

śabdo paraḥ mahā rāja tatra api prāharam śarān

original: 03,023.008a evaṃ daśa diśaḥ sarvās tiryag ūrdhvaṃ ca bhārata
analyzed: evam daśa diśaḥ sarvāḥ tiryak ūrdhvam ca bhārata

original: 03,023.008c nādayām āsur asurās te cāpi nihatā mayā
analyzed: nādayām āsuḥ asurāḥ te ca api nihatāḥ mayā

original: 03,023.009a tataḥ prāgjyotiṣaṃ gatvā punar eva vyadṛśyata
analyzed: tatas prāgjyotiṣam gatvā punar eva vyadṛśyata

original: 03,023.009c saubhaṃ kāmagamaṃ vīra mohayan mama cakṣuṣī
analyzed: saubham kāma gamam vīra mohayan mama cakṣuṣī
tatas loka anta karaṇaḥ dānavaḥ vānara ākṛtiḥ
śilā varṣeṇa sahasā mahatā mām samāvṛṇot
saḥ ham parvata varṣeṇa vadhyamānaḥ samantataḥ
valmīkaḥ iva rāja indra parvata upacitaḥ bhavam

original: 03,023.012c aprakhyātim iyāṃ rājan sadhvajaḥ parvataiś citaḥ
analyzed: aprakhyātim iyām rājan sa dhvajaḥ parvataiḥ citaḥ

original: 03,023.013a tato vṛṣṇipravīrā ye mamāsan sainikās tadā

original: 03,023.013c te bhayārtā diśaḥ sarvāḥ sahasā vipradudruvuḥ
analyzed: te bhaya ārtāḥ diśaḥ sarvāḥ sahasā vipradudruvuḥ

original: 03,023.014a tato hāhākṛtaṃ sarvam abhūt kila viśāṃ pate

original: 03,023.014c dyauś ca bhūmiś ca khaṃ caivādṛśyamāne tathā mayi

tatas viṣaṇṇa manasaḥ mama rājan suhṛd janāḥ

original: 03,023.016a dviṣatāṃ ca praharṣo 'bhūd ārtiś cādviṣatām api

original: 03,023.016c evaṃ vijitavān vīra paścād aśrauṣam acyuta

original: 03,023.017c vajram udyamya tān sarvān parvatān samaśātayam
analyzed: vajram udyamya tān sarvān parvatān samaśātayam

original: 03,023.019c dṛṣṭvā māṃ bāndhavāḥ sarve harṣam āhārayan punaḥ

original: 03,023.020a tato mām abravīt sūtaḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇato nṛpa

original: 03,023.020c sādhu saṃpaśya vārṣṇeya śālvaṃ saubhapatiṃ sthitam

original: 03,023.021c mārdavaṃ sakhitāṃ caiva śālvād adya vyapāhara
analyzed: mārdavam sakhitām ca eva śālvāt adya vyapāhara

original: 03,023.022a jahi śālvaṃ mahābāho mainaṃ jīvaya keśava
analyzed: jahi śālvam mahā bāho mā enam jīvaya keśava

original: 03,023.022c sarvaiḥ parākramair vīra vadhyaḥ śatrur amitrahan
analyzed: sarvaiḥ parākramaiḥ vīra vadhyaḥ śatruḥ amitra han
na śatruḥ avamantavyaḥ durbalaḥ pi balīyasā

original: 03,023.023c yo 'pi syāt pīṭhagaḥ kaś cit kiṃ punaḥ samare sthitaḥ

original: 03,023.024a sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla sarvayatnair imaṃ prabho

analyzed: jahi vṛṣṇi kula śreṣṭha mā tvām kālo tyagāt punar

original: 03,023.024d*0088_02 sa eṣa nānyair vadhyo hi tvām ṛte naiva kaiś cana

original: 03,023.025a naiṣa mārdavasādhyo vai mato nāpi sakhā tava

original: 03,023.025c yena tvaṃ yodhito vīra dvārakā cāvamarditā
analyzed: yena tvam yodhitaḥ vīra dvārakā ca avamarditā

original: 03,023.026a evamādi tu kaunteya śrutvāhaṃ sārather vacaḥ
analyzed: evamādi tu kaunteya śrutvā aham sāratheḥ vacaḥ

analyzed: tattvam etat iti jñātvā yuddhe matim adhārayam

original: 03,023.027c dārukaṃ cābruvaṃ vīra muhūrtaṃ sthīyatām iti
analyzed: dārukam ca abruvam vīra muhūrtam sthīyatām iti
tatas pratihatam divyam abhedyam ati vīryavat

original: 03,023.029a yakṣāṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca dānavānāṃ ca saṃyuge
analyzed: yakṣāṇām rākṣasānām ca dānavānām ca saṃyuge

original: 03,023.031a jahi saubhaṃ svavīryeṇa ye cātra ripavo mama
analyzed: jahi saubham sva vīryeṇa ye ca atra ripavaḥ mama

analyzed: iti uktvā bhuja vīryeṇa tasmai prāhiṇavam ruṣā
rūpam sudarśanasya āsīt ākāśe patataḥ tadā

tat samāsādya nagaram saubham vyapagata tviṣam

original: 03,023.033c madhyena pāṭayām āsa krakaco dārv ivocchritam
analyzed: madhyena pāṭayām āsa krakacaḥ dāru iva ucchritam

analyzed: tasmin nipatite saubhe cakram āgāt karam mama

original: 03,023.035c punaś coddhūya vegena śālvāyety aham abruvam

original: 03,023.036a tataḥ śālvaṃ gadāṃ gurvīm āvidhyantaṃ mahāhave

original: 03,023.036c dvidhā cakāra sahasā prajajvāla ca tejasā
analyzed: dvidhā cakāra sahasā prajajvāla ca tejasā

original: 03,023.037c hāhābhūtā diśo jagmur arditā mama sāyakaiḥ
analyzed: hāhā bhūtāḥ diśaḥ jagmuḥ arditāḥ mama sāyakaiḥ
tatas ham samavasthāpya ratham saubha samīpataḥ

tat meru śikhara ākāram vidhvasta aṭṭāla gopuram

original: 03,023.040a evaṃ nihatya samare śālvaṃ saubhaṃ nipātya ca
analyzed: evam nihatya samare śālvam saubham nipātya ca

analyzed: ānartān punar āgamya suhṛdām prītim āvaham

original: 03,023.041c yady agāṃ paravīraghna na hi jīvet suyodhanaḥ
analyzed: yadi agām para vīra ghna na hi jīvet suyodhanaḥ

original: 03,023.041d*0090_01 mayy āgate 'thavā vīra dyūtaṃ na bhavitā tathā
analyzed: mayi āgate thavā vīra dyūtam na bhavitā tathā
adya aham kim kariṣyāmi bhinna setuḥ iva udakam
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca
evam uktvā mahā bāhuḥ kauravam puruṣottamaḥ
āmantrya prayayau dhīmān pāṇḍavān madhusūdanaḥ
abhivādya mahā bāhuḥ dharmarājam yudhiṣṭhiram

original: 03,023.043c rājñā mūrdhany upāghrāto bhīmena ca mahābhujaḥ
analyzed: rājñā mūrdhani upāghrātaḥ bhīmena ca mahā bhujaḥ
pariṣvaktaḥ ca arjunena yamābhyām ca abhivāditaḥ

original: 03,023.044a subhadrām abhimanyuṃ ca ratham āropya kāñcanam
analyzed: subhadrām abhimanyum ca ratham āropya kāñcanam
āruroha ratham kṛṣṇaḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ abhipūjitaḥ
sainya sugrīva yuktena rathena āditya varcasā
dvārakām prayayau kṛṣṇaḥ samāśvāsya yudhiṣṭhiram
tatas prayāte dāśārhe dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ pi pārṣataḥ
draupadeyān upādāya prayayau sva puram tadā
dhṛṣṭaketuḥ svasāram ca samādāya atha cedi rāj

original: 03,023.047c jagāma pāṇḍavān dṛṣṭvā ramyāṃ śuktimatīṃ purīm
analyzed: jagāma pāṇḍavān dṛṣṭvā ramyām śuktimatīm purīm

original: 03,023.048c āmantrya pāṇḍavān sarvān prayayus te 'pi bhārata
analyzed: āmantrya pāṇḍavān sarvān prayayuḥ te pi bhārata

original: 03,023.049a brāhmaṇāś ca viśaś caiva tathā viṣayavāsinaḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ ca viśaḥ ca eva tathā viṣaya vāsinaḥ

original: 03,023.049c visṛjyamānāḥ subhṛśaṃ na tyajanti sma pāṇḍavān
analyzed: visṛjyamānāḥ su bhṛśam na tyajanti sma pāṇḍavān

original: 03,023.051a yudhiṣṭhiras tu viprāṃs tān anumānya mahāmanāḥ
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ tu viprān tān anumānya mahā manāḥ

original: 03,023.051c śaśāsa puruṣān kāle rathān yojayateti ha
analyzed: śaśāsa puruṣān kāle rathān yojayata iti ha

tasmin daśārha adhipatau prayāte

original: 03,024.001c yamau ca kṛṣṇā ca purohitaś ca;
analyzed: yamau ca kṛṣṇā ca purohitaḥ ca
rathān mahārhān parama aśva yuktān
āsthāya vīrāḥ sahitāḥ vanāya
pratasthire bhūtapati prakāśāḥ
hiraṇya niṣkān vasanāni gāḥ ca
pradāya śikṣā akṣara mantra vidbhyaḥ
preṣyāḥ puras viṃśatiḥ ātta śastrā
dhanūṃṣi varmāṇi śarān ca pītān

original: 03,024.003c maurvīś ca yantrāṇi ca sāyakāṃś ca;
analyzed: maurvīḥ ca yantrāṇi ca sāyakān ca
sarve samādāya jaghanyam īyuḥ
tatas tu vāsāṃsi ca rāja putryā

original: dhātryaś ca dāsyaś ca vibhūṣaṇaṃ ca
analyzed: dhātryaḥ ca dāsyaḥ ca vibhūṣaṇam ca
tat indrasenaḥ tvaritam pragṛhya
jaghanyam eva upayayau rathena
tatas kuruśreṣṭham upetya paurāḥ
pradakṣiṇam cakruḥ adīna sattvāḥ
tam brāhmaṇāḥ ca abhyavadan prasannā
mukhyāḥ ca sarve kurujāṅgalānām
sa ca api tān abhyavadat prasannaḥ
saha eva taiḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ dharmarājaḥ
tasthau ca tatra adhipatiḥ mahātmā
dṛṣṭvā jana ogham kurujāṅgalānām
pitā iva putreṣu sa teṣu bhāvam
cakre kurūṇām ṛṣabhaḥ mahātmā
te ca api tasmin bharata prabarhe
tadā babhūvuḥ pitari iva putrāḥ
tatas samāsādya mahā jana oghāḥ
kuru pravīram parivārya tasthuḥ

original: 03,024.008c hā nātha hā dharma iti bruvanto;
analyzed: hā nātha hā dharmaḥ iti bruvantaḥ
hriyā ca sarve śru mukhāḥ babhūvuḥ
varaḥ kurūṇām adhipaḥ prajānām
pitā iva putrān apahāya ca asmān
paurān imām jānapadān ca sarvān
hitvā prayātaḥ kva nu dharmarājaḥ
dhik dhārtarāṣṭram su nṛśaṃsa buddhim
sa saubalam pāpa matim ca karṇam
anartham icchanti narendra pāpā
ye dharma nityasya sataḥ tava ugrāḥ
svayam niveśya apratimam mahātmā
puram mahat deva pura prakāśam
śatakratuprastham amoghakarmā
hitvā prayātaḥ kva nu dharmarājaḥ
cakāra yām apratimām mahātmā
sabhām mayaḥ deva sabhā prakāśām
tām deva guptām iva deva māyām
hitvā prayātaḥ kva nu dharmarājaḥ
tān dharma kāma artha vid uttama ojāḥ
bībhatsuḥ uccais sahitān uvāca
ādāsyate vāsam imam niruṣya
vaneṣu rājā dviṣatām yaśāṃsi
dvijāti mukhyāḥ sahitāḥ pṛthak ca
bhavadbhiḥ āsādya tapasvinaḥ ca
prasādya dharma artha vidaḥ ca vācyā
yathā artha siddhiḥ paramā bhavet naḥ
iti evam ukte vacane rjunena
te brāhmaṇāḥ sarva varṇāḥ ca rājan
mudā abhyanandan sahitāḥ ca cakruḥ
pradakṣiṇam dharma bhṛtām variṣṭham
āmantrya pārtham ca vṛkodaram ca
dhanaṃjayam yājñasenīm yamau ca
pratasthire rāṣṭram apeta harṣā
yudhiṣṭhireṇa anumatāḥ yathāsvam
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca
tatas teṣu prayāteṣu kaunteyaḥ satya saṃgaraḥ
abhyabhāṣata dharma ātmā bhrātṝn sarvān yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
dvādaśa imāḥ samā asmābhiḥ vastavyam nirjane vane
samīkṣadhvam mahā araṇye deśam bahu mṛga dvijam
bahu puṣpa phalam ramyam śivam puṇya jana ucitam
yatra imāḥ śaradaḥ sarvāḥ sukham prativasemahi
evam ukte pratyuvāca dharmarājam dhanaṃjayaḥ
guru vat mānava gurum mānayitvā manasvinam
arjunaḥ uvāca
bhavān eva mahā ṛṣīṇām vṛddhānām paryupāsitā

original: 03,025.005c ajñātaṃ mānuṣe loke bhavato nāsti kiṃ cana

original: 03,025.006a tvayā hy upāsitā nityaṃ brāhmaṇā bharatarṣabha

original: 03,025.008a sarvā gatīr vijānāsi brāhmaṇānāṃ na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: sarvāḥ gatīḥ vijānāsi brāhmaṇānām na saṃśayaḥ

original: 03,025.008c prabhāvāṃś caiva vettha tvaṃ sarveṣām eva pārthiva

original: 03,025.009a tvam eva rājañ jānāsi śreyaḥkāraṇam eva ca
analyzed: tvam eva rājam jānāsi śreyaḥ kāraṇam eva ca

bahu puṣpa phalam ramyam nānā dvija niṣevitam
atra imāḥ dvādaśa samāḥ viharema iti rocaye

original: 03,025.011c yadi te 'numataṃ rājan kiṃ vānyan manyate bhavān
analyzed: yadi te numatam rājan kim vā anyat manyate bhavān

original: 03,025.012a mamāpy etan mataṃ pārtha tvayā yat samudāhṛtam
analyzed: mama api etat matam pārtha tvayā yat samudāhṛtam

original: 03,025.012c gacchāma puṇyaṃ vikhyātaṃ mahad dvaitavanaṃ saraḥ
analyzed: gacchāma puṇyam vikhyātam mahat dvaitavanam saraḥ

original: 03,025.013a tatas te prayayuḥ sarve pāṇḍavā dharmacāriṇaḥ
analyzed: tatas te prayayuḥ sarve pāṇḍavāḥ dharma cāriṇaḥ

original: 03,025.013c brāhmaṇair bahubhiḥ sārdhaṃ puṇyaṃ dvaitavanaṃ saraḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇaiḥ bahubhiḥ sārdham puṇyam dvaitavanam saraḥ

original: 03,025.014a brāhmaṇāḥ sāgnihotrāś ca tathaiva ca niragnayaḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ sa agnihotrāḥ ca tathā eva ca niragnayaḥ

kāma anulomān ayujaḥ yujaḥ ca
śakyam niyantum abhaviṣyat ātmā
manyuḥ tu hanti puruṣasya dhairyam
yantum na ātmā śakyate pauruṣeṇa
mānena vīryeṇa ca tāta naddhaḥ
na te vācam bhīmasena abhyasūye
manye tathā tat bhavitavyam āsīt
sa naḥ rājā dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putraḥ
nyapātayat vyasane rājyam icchan
dāsyam ca naḥ gamayat bhīmasena
yatra abhavat śaraṇam draupadī naḥ

original: 03,035.007a tvaṃ cāpi tad vettha dhanaṃjayaś ca;
analyzed: tvam ca api tat vettha dhanaṃjayaḥ ca
punardyūtāya āgatānām sabhām naḥ
yat mā abravīt dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putra
eka glaha artham bharatānām samakṣam
vane samāḥ dvādaśa rāja putra
yathākāmam viditam ajātaśatro
atha aparam ca a viditam carethāḥ
sarvaiḥ saha bhrātṛbhiḥ chadma gūḍhaḥ

original: 03,035.009a tvāṃ cec chrutvā tāta tathā carantam;
analyzed: tvām ced śrutvā tāta tathā carantam
avabhotsyante bhāratānām carāḥ sma
anyān carethāḥ tāvataḥ bdān tatas tvam
niścitya tat pratijānīhi pārtha
caraiḥ ced naḥ viditaḥ kālam etam
yuktaḥ rājan mohayitvā madīyān
bravīmi satyam kuru saṃsadi iha
tava eva tāḥ bhārata pañca nadyaḥ
vayam ca evam bhrātaraḥ sarve eva
tvayā jitāḥ kālam apāsya bhogān

original: 03,035.011c vasema ity āha purā sa rājā;
analyzed: vasema iti āha purā sa rājā
madhye kurūṇām sa mayā uktaḥ tathā iti
tatra dyūtam abhavat naḥ jaghanyam
tasmin jitāḥ pravrajitāḥ ca sarve
ittham ca deśān anusaṃcarāmaḥ
vanāni kṛcchrāṇi ca kṛcchra rūpāḥ
suyodhanaḥ ca api na śāntim icchan
bhūyas sa manyoḥ vaśam anvagacchat
udyojayām āsa kurūn ca sarvān

original: ye cāsya ke cid vaśam anvagacchan
analyzed: ye ca asya ke cit vaśam anvagacchan
tam saṃdhim āsthāya satām sakāśe
kaḥ nāma jahyāt iha rājya hetoḥ
āryasya manye maraṇāt garīyaḥ
yat dharmam utkramya mahīm praśiṣyāt
tadā eva ced
yadā dyūte parigham paryamṛkṣaḥ
bāhū didhakṣan vāritas phalgunena
kim duṣkṛtam bhīma tadā abhaviṣyat
prāk eva ca evam samaya kriyāyāḥ
kim na abravīḥ pauruṣam āvidānaḥ

original: 03,035.016c prāptaṃ tu kālaṃ tv abhipadya paścāt;
analyzed: prāptam tu kālam tu abhipadya paścāt
kim mām idānīm ativelam āttha
bhūyas duḥkham mama bhīmasena
dūye viṣasya iva rasam viditvā
yat yājñasenīm parikṛṣyamāṇām

original: saṃdṛśya tat kṣāntam iti sma bhīma
analyzed: saṃdṛśya tat kṣāntam iti sma bhīma
na tu adya śakyam bharata pravīra
kṛtvā yat uktam kuru vīra madhye
kālam pratīkṣasva sukha udayasya
paktim phalānām iva bījavāpaḥ
yadā hi pūrvam nikṛtaḥ nikṛtyā
vairam sa puṣpam sa phalam viditvā
mahā guṇam harati hi pauruṣeṇa
tadā vīraḥ jīvati jīva loke
śriyam ca loke labhate samagrām
manye ca asmai śatravaḥ saṃnamante
mitrāṇi ca enam atirāgāt bhajante
devāḥ iva indram anujīvanti ca enam
mama pratijñām ca nibodha satyām
vṛṇe dharmam amṛtāt jīvitāt ca

original: 03,035.021c rājyaṃ ca putrāś ca yaśo dhanaṃ ca;
analyzed: rājyam ca putrāḥ ca yaśaḥ dhanam ca
sarvam na satyasya kalām upaiti
bhīmasenaḥ uvāca
saṃdhim kṛtvā eva kālena antakena patatriṇā
anantena aprameyena srotasā sarva hāriṇā

original: 03,036.002a pratyakṣaṃ manyase kālaṃ martyaḥ san kālabandhanaḥ
analyzed: pratyakṣam manyase kālam martyaḥ san kāla bandhanaḥ
phenadharmā mahā rāja phaladharmā tathā eva ca
nimeṣāt api kaunteya yasya āyuḥ apacīyate
sūcyā iva añjana cūrṇasya kim iti pratipālayet

original: 03,036.004a yo nūnam amitāyuḥ syād atha vāpi pramāṇavit
analyzed: yaḥ nūnam amita āyuḥ syāt atha vā api pramāṇa vid
sa kālam vai pratīkṣeta sarva pratyakṣa darśivān

original: 03,036.005a pratīkṣamāṇān kālo naḥ samā rājaṃs trayodaśa
analyzed: pratīkṣamāṇān kālaḥ naḥ samāḥ rājan trayodaśa
āyuṣaḥ upacayam kṛtvā maraṇāya upaneṣyati

original: 03,036.006a śarīriṇāṃ hi maraṇaṃ śarīre nityam āśritam
analyzed: śarīriṇām hi maraṇam śarīre nityam āśritam

original: 03,036.006c prāg eva maraṇāt tasmād rājyāyaiva ghaṭāmahe
analyzed: prāk eva maraṇāt tasmāt rājyāya eva ghaṭāmahe

original: 03,036.007a yo na yāti prasaṃkhyānam aspaṣṭo bhūmivardhanaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ na yāti prasaṃkhyānam aspaṣṭaḥ bhūmi vardhanaḥ
a yātayitvā vairāṇi saḥ vasīdati gauḥ iva

original: 03,036.008a yo na yātayate vairam alpasattvodyamaḥ pumān
analyzed: yaḥ na yātayate vairam alpa sattva udyamaḥ pumān

original: 03,036.009a hairaṇyau bhavato bāhū śrutir bhavati pārthiva
analyzed: hairaṇyau bhavataḥ bāhū śrutiḥ bhavati pārthiva

original: 03,036.009c hatvā dviṣantaṃ saṃgrāme bhuktvā bāhvarjitaṃ vasu
analyzed: hatvā dviṣantam saṃgrāme bhuktvā bāhu arjitam vasu

original: 03,036.010a hatvā cet puruṣo rājan nikartāram ariṃdama
analyzed: hatvā ced puruṣaḥ rājan nikartāram ariṃdama

original: 03,036.010c ahnāya narakaṃ gacchet svargeṇāsya sa saṃmitaḥ
analyzed: ahnāya narakam gacchet svargeṇa asya sa saṃmitaḥ
amarṣa jaḥ hi saṃtāpaḥ pāvakāt dīptimattaraḥ

original: 03,036.011c yenāham abhisaṃtapto na naktaṃ na divā śaye
analyzed: yena aham abhisaṃtaptaḥ na naktam na divā śaye

original: 03,036.012a ayaṃ ca pārtho bībhatsur variṣṭho jyāvikarṣaṇe
analyzed: ayam ca pārthaḥ bībhatsuḥ variṣṭhaḥ jyā vikarṣaṇe
āste parama saṃtaptaḥ nūnam siṃhaḥ iva āśaye
yaḥ yam ekaḥ bhimanute sarvān loke dhanuḥ bhṛtaḥ
saḥ yam ātma jam ūṣmāṇam mahā hastī iva yacchati

original: 03,036.014a nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca vṛddhā mātā ca vīrasūḥ
analyzed: nakulaḥ sahadevaḥ ca vṛddhā mātā ca vīrasūḥ

original: 03,036.015a sarve te priyam icchanti bāndhavāḥ saha sṛñjayaiḥ
analyzed: sarve te priyam icchanti bāndhavāḥ saha sṛñjayaiḥ

original: 03,036.016a priyam eva tu sarveṣāṃ yad bravīmy uta kiṃ cana
analyzed: priyam eva tu sarveṣām yat bravīmi uta kim cana

original: 03,036.017a netaḥ pāpīyasī kā cid āpad rājan bhaviṣyati
analyzed: na itas pāpīyasī kā cit āpad rājan bhaviṣyati

original: 03,036.017c yan no nīcair alpabalai rājyam ācchidya bhujyate

original: 03,036.018c kleśāṃs titikṣase rājan nānyaḥ kaś cit praśaṃsati
analyzed: kleśān titikṣase rājan na anyaḥ kaḥ cit praśaṃsati
śrotriyasya iva te rājan mandakasya a vipaścitaḥ
anuvāka hatā buddhiḥ na eṣā tattva artha darśinī
ghṛṇī brāhmaṇa rūpaḥ si katham kṣatre ajāyathāḥ

original: 03,036.019c asyāṃ hi yonau jāyante prāyaśaḥ krūrabuddhayaḥ
analyzed: asyām hi yonau jāyante prāyaśas krūra buddhayaḥ

original: 03,036.020a aśrauṣīs tvaṃ rājadharmān yathā vai manur abravīt

analyzed: vidyāyām atha lābhe vā mātuḥ uccāre eva saḥ

original: 03,036.025a imau ca siṃhasaṃkāśau bhrātarau sahitau śiśū
analyzed: imau ca siṃha saṃkāśau bhrātarau sahitau śiśū

original: 03,036.025c nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca kathaṃ pārtha cariṣyataḥ
analyzed: nakulaḥ sahadevaḥ ca katham pārtha cariṣyataḥ

original: 03,036.026c viśrutā katham ajñātā kṛṣṇā pārtha cariṣyati
analyzed: viśrutā katham ajñātā kṛṣṇā pārtha cariṣyati

original: 03,036.027a māṃ cāpi rājañ jānanti ākumāram imāḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: mām ca api rājam jānanti ākumāram imāḥ prajāḥ

original: 03,036.029a na hi te 'py upaśāmyanti nikṛtānāṃ nirākṛtāḥ
analyzed: na hi te pi upaśāmyanti nikṛtānām nirākṛtāḥ

original: 03,036.030a te 'py asmāsu prayuñjīran pracchannān subahūñ janān

original: 03,036.030c ācakṣīraṃś ca no jñātvā tan naḥ syāt sumahad bhayam

original: 03,036.031a asmābhir uṣitāḥ samyag vane māsās trayodaśa

original: 03,036.032a asti māsaḥ pratinidhir yathā prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ

original: 03,036.034a tasmāc chatruvadhe rājan kriyatāṃ niścayas tvayā

original: 03,036.034c kṣatriyasya tu sarvasya nānyo dharmo 'sti saṃyugāt
analyzed: kṣatriyasya tu sarvasya na anyaḥ dharmaḥ sti saṃyugāt

original: 03,037.001d*0136_02 āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati
analyzed: āyatyām ca tadātve ca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati

original: 03,037.003a evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi bhārata
analyzed: evam etat mahā bāho yathā vadasi bhārata

original: 03,037.005c sidhyanty arthā mahābāho daivaṃ cātra pradakṣiṇam

original: 03,037.011c saṃvibhaktā hi mātrābhir bhogair api ca sarvaśaḥ

original: 03,037.012a duryodhanena te vīrā mānitāś ca viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: duryodhanena te vīrāḥ mānitāḥ ca viśeṣataḥ

original: 03,037.012c prāṇāṃs tyakṣyanti saṃgrāme iti me niścitā matiḥ
analyzed: prāṇān tyakṣyanti saṃgrāme iti me niścitā matiḥ

original: 03,037.013a samā yady api bhīṣmasya vṛttir asmāsu teṣu ca

original: 03,037.013c droṇasya ca mahābāho kṛpasya ca mahātmanaḥ

original: 03,037.019c babhūva vimanās trasto na caivovāca kiṃ cana

original: 03,037.021c yudhiṣṭhiram idaṃ vākyam uvāca vadatāṃ varaḥ

original: 03,037.023a bhīṣmād droṇāt kṛpāt karṇād droṇaputrāc ca bhārata

viloḍayām āsa tadā puṣpa hetoḥ ariṃdamaḥ
viṣama cheda racitaiḥ anuliptam iva aṅgulaiḥ

original: 03,232.013a kiṃ hy abhyadhikam etasmād yad āpannaḥ suyodhanaḥ

original: 03,232.018a etāvad dhi mayā śakyaṃ saṃdeṣṭuṃ vai vṛkodara

original: 03,232.020a yadi sāmnā na mokṣyanti gandharvā dhṛtarāṣṭrajān

original: 03,232.021d@023_0019 bhrātaraṃ te mahābāho baddhvā nayati mām ayam

kuru vaṃśasya su mahat ayaśaḥ prāptam īdṛśam

evam vilapamānasya kauravasya ārtayā girā
śrutvā vilāpam saṃbhrāntaḥ ghṛṇayā abhipariplutaḥ

prahṛṣṭa vadanāḥ sarve samuttasthuḥ nara ṛṣabhāḥ
abhedyāni tatas sarve samanahyanta bhārata
jāmbūnada vicitrāṇi kavacāni mahā rathāḥ

original: 03,233.003a te daṃśitā rathaiḥ sarve dhvajinaḥ saśarāsanāḥ

original: 03,233.004a tān rathān sādhu saṃpannān saṃyuktāñ javanair hayaiḥ

original: 03,233.004c āsthāya rathaśārdūlāḥ śīghram eva yayus tataḥ

original: 03,233.006a jitakāśinaś ca khacarās tvaritāś ca mahārathāḥ
analyzed: jita kāśinaḥ ca kha carāḥ tvaritāḥ ca mahā rathāḥ

nyavartanta tatas sarve gandharvāḥ jita kāśinaḥ

original: 03,233.007c dṛṣṭvā rathagatān vīrān pāṇḍavāṃś caturo raṇe
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ratha gatān vīrān pāṇḍavān caturaḥ raṇe

original: 03,233.008a tāṃs tu vibhrājato dṛṣṭvā lokapālān ivodyatān

original: 03,233.009a rājñas tu vacanaṃ śrutvā dharmarājasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: rājñaḥ tu vacanam śrutvā dharmarājasya dhīmataḥ
krameṇa mṛdunā yuddham upakrāmanta bhārata
na tu gandharva rājasya sainikāḥ manda cetasaḥ

original: 03,233.011a tatas tān yudhi durdharṣaḥ savyasācī paraṃtapaḥ

original: 03,233.011c sāntvapūrvam idaṃ vākyam uvāca khacarān raṇe

na etat gandharva rājasya yuktam karma jugupsitam
para dāra abhimarśaḥ ca mānuṣaiḥ ca samāgamaḥ

original: 03,233.014a evam uktās tu gandharvāḥ pāṇḍavena yaśasvinā

original: 03,233.014c utsmayantas tadā pārtham idaṃ vacanam abruvan

original: 03,233.015a ekasyaiva vayaṃ tāta kuryāma vacanaṃ bhuvi
analyzed: ekasya eva vayam tāta kuryāma vacanam bhuvi

original: 03,233.016c na śāstā vidyate 'smākam anyas tasmāt sureśvarāt
analyzed: na śāstā vidyate smākam anyaḥ tasmāt sureśvarāt

original: 03,233.017a evam uktas tu gandharvaiḥ kuntīputro dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: 03,233.018a yadi sāmnā na mokṣadhvaṃ gandharvā dhṛtarāṣṭrajam

original: 03,233.019a evam uktvā tataḥ pārthaḥ savyasācī dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: 03,233.019c sasarja niśitān bāṇān khacarān khacarān prati
analyzed: sasarja niśitān bāṇān kha carān kha carān prati

tatas su tumulam yuddham gandharvāṇām tarasvinām
babhūva bhīma vegānām pāṇḍavānām ca bhārata

original: 03,234.002a catvāraḥ pāṇḍavā vīrā gandharvāś ca sahasraśaḥ

original: 03,234.002c raṇe saṃnyapatan rājaṃs tad adbhutam ivābhavat

original: 03,234.003a yathā karṇasya ca ratho dhārtarāṣṭrasya cobhayoḥ

original: 03,234.003c gandharvaiḥ śataśaś chinnau tathā teṣāṃ pracakrire

original: 03,234.004a tān samāpatato rājan gandharvāñ śataśo raṇe

na śekuḥ pāṇḍu putrāṇām samīpe parivartitum
abhikruddhān abhiprekṣya gandharvān arjunaḥ tadā

original: 03,234.008a tathā bhīmo maheṣvāsaḥ saṃyuge balināṃ varaḥ

original: 03,234.008c gandharvāñ śataśo rājañ jaghāna niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 03,234.010a te vadhyamānā gandharvā divyair astrair mahātmabhiḥ
analyzed: te vadhyamānāḥ gandharvāḥ divyaiḥ astraiḥ mahātmabhiḥ

original: 03,234.011a tān utpatiṣṇūn buddhvā tu kuntīputro dhanaṃjayaḥ

gātrāṇi ca ahanat bhallaiḥ gandharvāṇām dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: 03,234.014a śirobhiḥ prapatadbhiś ca caraṇair bāhubhis tathā
analyzed: śirobhiḥ prapatadbhiḥ ca caraṇaiḥ bāhubhiḥ tathā

bhūmiṣṭham antarikṣa sthāḥ śara varṣaiḥ avākiran

original: 03,234.017c āgneyaṃ cāpi saumyaṃ ca sasarja kurunandanaḥ
analyzed: āgneyam ca api saumyam ca sasarja kuru nandanaḥ

original: 03,234.018c daiteyā iva śakreṇa viṣādam agaman param
analyzed: daiteyāḥ iva śakreṇa viṣādam agaman param
ūrdhvam ākramamāṇāḥ ca śara jālena vāritāḥ

gandharvān trāsitān dṛṣṭvā kuntī putreṇa dhīmatā
citrasenaḥ gadām gṛhya savyasācinam ādravat
tasya abhipatataḥ tūrṇam gadā hastasya saṃyuge

original: 03,234.021c gadāṃ sarvāyasīṃ pārthaḥ śaraiś ciccheda saptadhā
analyzed: gadām sarva āyasīm pārthaḥ śaraiḥ ciccheda saptadhā

original: 03,234.022a sa gadāṃ bahudhā dṛṣṭvā kṛttāṃ bāṇais tarasvinā
analyzed: sa gadām bahudhā dṛṣṭvā kṛttām bāṇaiḥ tarasvinā

original: 03,234.022e astrāṇi tasya divyāni yodhayām āsa khe sthitaḥ
analyzed: astrāṇi tasya divyāni yodhayām āsa khe sthitaḥ

original: 03,234.022f*1128_01 divyair astrais tadā vīraḥ paryavārayad arjunaḥ

original: 03,234.022f*1128_02 sa vāryamāṇas tair astrair arjunena mahātmanā
analyzed: sa vāryamāṇaḥ taiḥ astraiḥ arjunena mahātmanā
gandharva rājaḥ balavān māyayā antarhitaḥ tadā
antarhitam samālakṣya praharantam atha arjunaḥ
tāḍayām āsa kha caraiḥ divya astra pratimantritaiḥ
antardhāna vadham ca asya cakre kruddhaḥ rjunaḥ tadā
śabdavedhyam upāśritya bahu rūpaḥ dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: 03,234.025a sa vadhyamānas tair astrair arjunena mahātmanā
analyzed: sa vadhyamānaḥ taiḥ astraiḥ arjunena mahātmanā

original: 03,234.025c athāsya darśayām āsa tadātmānaṃ priyaḥ sakhā
analyzed: atha asya darśayām āsa tadā ātmānam priyaḥ sakhā

original: 03,234.025d*1129_01 citrasenas tathovāca sakhāyaṃ yudhi viddhi mām
analyzed: citrasenaḥ tathā uvāca sakhāyam yudhi viddhi mām
citrasenam athā ālakṣya sakhāyam yudhi durbalam
saṃjahāra astram atha tat prasṛṣṭam pāṇḍava ṛṣabhaḥ

original: 03,234.027a dṛṣṭvā tu pāṇḍavāḥ sarve saṃhṛtāstraṃ dhanaṃjayam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tu pāṇḍavāḥ sarve saṃhṛta astram dhanaṃjayam

original: 03,234.027c saṃjahruḥ pradrutān aśvāñ śaravegān dhanūṃṣi ca
analyzed: saṃjahruḥ pradrutān aśvām śara vegān dhanūṃṣi ca

original: 03,234.028a citrasenaś ca bhīmaś ca savyasācī yamāv api
analyzed: citrasenaḥ ca bhīmaḥ ca savyasācī yamau api
pṛṣṭvā kauśalam anyonyam ratheṣu eva avatasthire
vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca
tatas rjunaḥ citrasenam prahasan idam abravīt
madhye gandharva sainyānām mahā iṣvāsaḥ mahā dyutiḥ

original: 03,235.002a kiṃ te vyavasitaṃ vīra kauravāṇāṃ vinigrahe
analyzed: kim te vyavasitam vīra kauravāṇām vinigrahe
kimartham ca sa dāraḥ yam nigṛhītaḥ suyodhanaḥ
citrasenaḥ uvāca
viditaḥ yam abhiprāyaḥ tatrasthena mahātmanā
duryodhanasya pāpasya karṇasya ca dhanaṃjaya
vanasthān bhavataḥ jñātvā kliśyamānān anarha vat

kumudaḥ pi mahā vīryaḥ plavaga ṛṣabha sattama
ṣaṣṭi koṭi sahasrāṇi prakarṣan pratyadṛśyata
golāṅgūlaḥ mahā rāja gavākṣaḥ bhīma darśanaḥ
gandhamādana vāsī tu prathitaḥ gandhamādanaḥ
koṭī sahasram ugrāṇām harīṇām samakarṣata
panasaḥ nāma medhāvī vānaraḥ su mahā balaḥ

original: 03,267.006c koṭīr daśa dvādaśa ca triṃśatpañca prakarṣati
analyzed: koṭīḥ daśa dvādaśa ca triṃśat pañca prakarṣati
śrīmān dadhimukhaḥ nāma hari vṛddhaḥ pi vīryavān
pracakarṣa mahat sainyam harīṇām bhīma tejasām
kṛṣṇānām mukha puṇḍrāṇām ṛkṣāṇām bhīma karmaṇām
koṭī śata sahasreṇa jāmbavān pratyadṛśyata
ete ca anye ca bahavaḥ hari yūthapa yūthapāḥ
asaṃkhyeyāḥ mahā rāja samīyuḥ rāma kāraṇāt
śirīṣa kusuma ābhānām siṃhānām iva nardatām

original: 03,267.010c śrūyate tumulaḥ śabdas tatra tatra pradhāvatām
analyzed: śrūyate tumulaḥ śabdaḥ tatra tatra pradhāvatām

original: 03,267.011a girikūṭanibhāḥ ke cit ke cin mahiṣasaṃnibhāḥ
analyzed: giri kūṭa nibhāḥ ke cit ke cit mahiṣa saṃnibhāḥ
śarad abhra pratīkāśāḥ piṣṭa hiṅgulaka ānanāḥ

original: 03,267.012a utpatantaḥ patantaś ca plavamānāś ca vānarāḥ
analyzed: utpatantaḥ patantaḥ ca plavamānāḥ ca vānarāḥ
uddhunvantaḥ pare reṇūn samājagmuḥ samantataḥ
sa vānara mahā lokaḥ pūrṇa sāgara saṃnibhaḥ
niveśam akarot tatra sugrīva anumate tadā
tatas teṣu hari indreṣu samāvṛtteṣu sarvaśas
tithau praśaste nakṣatre muhūrte ca abhipūjite

original: 03,267.015a tena vyūḍhena sainyena lokān udvartayann iva
analyzed: tena vyūḍhena sainyena lokān udvartayan iva
prayayau rāghavaḥ śrīmān sugrīva sahitaḥ tadā

original: 03,267.016a mukham āsīt tu sainyasya hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
analyzed: mukham āsīt tu sainyasya hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
jaghanam pālayām āsa saumitriḥ akutobhayaḥ
baddha godhā aṅguli trāṇau rāghavau tatra rejatuḥ
vṛtau hari mahāmātraiḥ candra sūryau grahaiḥ iva
prababhau hari sainyam tat śāla tāla śilā āyudham
su mahat śāli bhavanam yathā sūrya udayam prati
yayau su mahatī senā rāghavasya artha siddhaye
vidhivat su praśasteṣu bahu mūla phaleṣu ca
prabhūta madhu māṃseṣu vārimatsu śiveṣu ca
nivasantī nirābādhā tathā eva giri sānuṣu

original: 03,267.021c upāyād dharisenā sā kṣārodam atha sāgaram
analyzed: upāyāt hari senā sā kṣārodam atha sāgaram
dvitīya sāgara nibham tat balam bahula dhvajam
velā vanam samāsādya nivāsam akarot tadā
tatas dāśarathiḥ śrīmān sugrīvam pratyabhāṣata
madhye vānara mukhyānām prāpta kālam idam vacaḥ

original: 03,267.024a upāyaḥ ko nu bhavatāṃ mataḥ sāgaralaṅghane
analyzed: upāyaḥ kaḥ nu bhavatām mataḥ sāgara laṅghane

original: 03,267.024c iyaṃ ca mahatī senā sāgaraś cāpi dustaraḥ
analyzed: iyam ca mahatī senā sāgaraḥ ca api dustaraḥ
tatra anye vyāharanti sma vānarāḥ paṭu māninaḥ

original: 03,267.025c samarthā laṅghane sindhor na tu kṛtsnasya vānarāḥ
analyzed: samarthāḥ laṅghane sindhoḥ na tu kṛtsnasya vānarāḥ

original: 03,267.026a ke cin naubhir vyavasyanti kecīc ca vividhaiḥ plavaiḥ
analyzed: ke cit naubhiḥ vyavasyanti ca vividhaiḥ plavaiḥ

original: 03,267.026c neti rāmaś ca tān sarvān sāntvayan pratyabhāṣata
analyzed: na iti rāmaḥ ca tān sarvān sāntvayan pratyabhāṣata
śata yojana vistāram na śaktāḥ sarva vānarāḥ

original: 03,267.027c krāntuṃ toyanidhiṃ vīrā naiṣā vo naiṣṭhikī matiḥ
analyzed: krāntum toyanidhim vīrāḥ na eṣā vaḥ naiṣṭhikī matiḥ

original: 03,267.028a nāvo na santi senāyā bahvyas tārayituṃ tathā
analyzed: nāvaḥ na santi senāyāḥ bahvyaḥ tārayitum tathā

original: 03,267.028c vaṇijām upaghātaṃ ca katham asmadvidhaś caret
analyzed: vaṇijām upaghātam ca katham asmadvidhaḥ caret

original: 03,267.029a vistīrṇaṃ caiva naḥ sainyaṃ hanyāc chidreṣu vai paraḥ
analyzed: vistīrṇam ca eva naḥ sainyam hanyāt chidreṣu vai paraḥ
plava uḍupa pratāraḥ ca nā eva atra mama rocate

original: 03,267.030a ahaṃ tv imaṃ jalanidhiṃ samārapsyāmy upāyataḥ
analyzed: aham tu imam jalanidhim samārapsyāmi upāyatas
pratiśeṣyāmi upavasan darśayiṣyati mām tatas

original: 03,267.031a na ced darśayitā mārgaṃ dhakṣyāmy enam ahaṃ tataḥ
analyzed: na ced darśayitā mārgam dhakṣyāmi enam aham tatas
mahā astraiḥ apratihataiḥ atyagni pavana ujjvalaiḥ
iti uktvā sahasaumitriḥ upaspṛśya atha rāghavaḥ
pratiśiśye jalanidhim vidhivat kuśa saṃstare

original: 03,267.033a sāgaras tu tataḥ svapne darśayām āsa rāghavam
analyzed: sāgaraḥ tu tatas svapne darśayām āsa rāghavam

original: 03,267.034a kausalyāmātar ity evam ābhāṣya madhuraṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: kausalyā mātar iti evam ābhāṣya madhuram vacaḥ

original: 03,267.034c idam ity āha ratnānām ākaraiḥ śataśo vṛtaḥ
analyzed: idam iti āha ratnānām ākaraiḥ śataśas vṛtaḥ

original: 03,267.035a brūhi kiṃ te karomy atra sāhāyyaṃ puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: brūhi kim te karomi atra sāhāyyam puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 03,267.035c ikṣvākur asmi te jñātir iti rāmas tam abravīt
analyzed: ikṣvākuḥ asmi te jñātiḥ iti rāmaḥ tam abravīt

original: 03,267.035d*1275_01 evam uktaḥ samudreṇa rāmo vākyam athābravīt
analyzed: evam uktaḥ samudreṇa rāmaḥ vākyam atha abravīt
mārgam icchāmi sainyasya dattam nadanadīpate
yena gatvā daśagrīvam hanyām paulastya pāṃsanam
rākṣasam sa anubandham tu mama bhāryā apahāriṇam

original: 03,267.037a yady evaṃ yācato mārgaṃ na pradāsyati me bhavān
analyzed: yadi evam yācataḥ mārgam na pradāsyati me bhavān
śaraiḥ tvām śoṣayiṣyāmi divya astra pratimantritaiḥ

original: 03,267.038a ity evaṃ bruvataḥ śrutvā rāmasya varuṇālayaḥ
analyzed: iti evam bruvataḥ śrutvā rāmasya varuṇālayaḥ

original: 03,267.038c uvāca vyathito vākyam iti baddhāñjaliḥ sthitaḥ
analyzed: uvāca vyathitaḥ vākyam iti baddhāñjaliḥ sthitaḥ

original: 03,267.039a necchāmi pratighātaṃ te nāsmi vighnakaras tava
analyzed: na icchāmi pratighātam te na asmi vighna karaḥ tava

original: 03,267.039c śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco rāma śrutvā kartavyam ācara
analyzed: śṛṇu ca idam vacaḥ rāma śrutvā kartavyam ācara

original: 03,267.040a yadi dāsyāmi te mārgaṃ sainyasya vrajato ''jñayā
analyzed: yadi dāsyāmi te mārgam sainyasya vrajataḥ jñayā

original: 03,267.040c anye 'py ājñāpayiṣyanti mām evaṃ dhanuṣo balāt
analyzed: anye pi ājñāpayiṣyanti mām evam dhanuṣaḥ balāt

original: 03,267.041a asti tv atra nalo nāma vānaraḥ śilpisaṃmataḥ
analyzed: asti tu atra nalaḥ nāma vānaraḥ śilpi saṃmataḥ
tvaṣṭuḥ devasya tanayaḥ balavān viśvakarmaṇaḥ

original: 03,267.042a sa yat kāṣṭhaṃ tṛṇaṃ vāpi śilāṃ vā kṣepsyate mayi
analyzed: sa yat kāṣṭham tṛṇam vā api śilām vā kṣepsyate mayi

original: 03,267.042c sarvaṃ tad dhārayiṣyāmi sa te setur bhaviṣyati
analyzed: sarvam tat dhārayiṣyāmi sa te setuḥ bhaviṣyati

original: 03,267.043a ity uktvāntarhite tasmin rāmo nalam uvāca ha
analyzed: iti uktvā antarhite tasmin rāmaḥ nalam uvāca ha

original: 03,267.043c kuru setuṃ samudre tvaṃ śakto hy asi mato mama
analyzed: kuru setum samudre tvam śaktaḥ hi asi mataḥ mama
tena upāyena kākutsthaḥ setubandham akārayat
daśa yojana vistāram āyatam śata yojanam

original: 03,267.045a nalasetur iti khyāto yo 'dyāpi prathito bhuvi
analyzed: nalasetuḥ iti khyātaḥ yaḥ dyā api prathitaḥ bhuvi
rāmasya ājñām puraskṛtya dhāryate giri saṃnibhaḥ

original: 03,267.046a tatrasthaṃ sa tu dharmātmā samāgacchad vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: tatrastham sa tu dharma ātmā samāgacchat vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 03,267.046c bhrātā vai rākṣasendrasya caturbhiḥ sacivaiḥ saha
analyzed: bhrātā vai rākṣasa indrasya caturbhiḥ sacivaiḥ saha
pratijagrāha rāmaḥ tam svāgatena mahā manāḥ

original: 03,267.047c sugrīvasya tu śaṅkābhūt praṇidhiḥ syād iti sma ha
analyzed: sugrīvasya tu śaṅkā abhūt praṇidhiḥ syāt iti sma ha

original: 03,267.048a rāghavas tasya ceṣṭābhiḥ samyak ca cariteṅgitaiḥ
analyzed: rāghavaḥ tasya ceṣṭābhiḥ samyak ca carita iṅgitaiḥ

original: 03,267.048c yadā tattvena tuṣṭo 'bhūt tata enam apūjayat
analyzed: yadā tattvena tuṣṭaḥ bhūt tatas enam apūjayat
sarva rākṣasa rājye ca api abhyaṣiñcat vibhīṣaṇam

original: 03,267.049c cakre ca mantrānucaraṃ suhṛdaṃ lakṣmaṇasya ca
analyzed: cakre ca mantra anucaram suhṛdam lakṣmaṇasya ca
vibhīṣaṇa mate ca eva saḥ tyakrāmat mahā arṇavam
sa sainyaḥ setunā tena māsena eva narādhipa
tatas gatvā samāsādya laṅkā udyānāni anekaśas

original: 03,267.051c bhedayām āsa kapibhir mahānti ca bahūni ca
analyzed: bhedayām āsa kapibhiḥ mahānti ca bahūni ca
tatra āstām rāvaṇa amātyau rākṣasau śuka sāraṇau
draṣṭum senām anuprāptau rāvaṇa priya kāriṇau
cārau vānara rūpeṇa tau jagrāha vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 03,267.053a pratipannau yadā rūpaṃ rākṣasaṃ tau niśācarau
analyzed: pratipannau yadā rūpam rākṣasam tau niśācarau

original: 03,267.053c darśayitvā tataḥ sainyaṃ rāmaḥ paścād avāsṛjat
analyzed: darśayitvā tatas sainyam rāmaḥ paścāt avāsṛjat
niveśya upavane sainyam tat śūraḥ prājña vānaram
preṣayām āsa dautyena rāvaṇasya tatas ṅgadam
mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca
prabhūta anna udake tasmin bahu mūla phale vane
senām niveśya kākutsthaḥ vidhivat paryarakṣata

original: 03,268.002a rāvaṇaś ca vidhiṃ cakre laṅkāyāṃ śāstranirmitam
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ ca vidhim cakre laṅkāyām śāstra nirmitam
prakṛtyā eva durādharṣā dṛḍha prākāra toraṇā
agādha toyāḥ parikhāḥ mīna nakra samākulāḥ

original: 03,268.003c babhūvuḥ sapta durdharṣāḥ khādiraiḥ śaṅkubhiś citāḥ
analyzed: babhūvuḥ sapta durdharṣāḥ khādiraiḥ śaṅkubhiḥ citāḥ
karṇa aṭṭayantra durdharṣāḥ babhūvuḥ sa huḍa upalāḥ
sa āśīviṣa ghaṭa ayodhāḥ sa sarjarasa pāṃsavaḥ
musala alāta nārāca tomara asi paraśvadhaiḥ
anvitāḥ ca śataghnībhiḥ sa madhūcchiṣṭa mudgarāḥ
pura dvāreṣu sarveṣu gulmāḥ sthāvara jaṅgamāḥ
babhūvuḥ patti bahulāḥ prabhūta gaja vājinaḥ

original: 03,268.007a aṅgadas tv atha laṅkāyā dvāradeśam upāgataḥ
analyzed: aṅgadaḥ tu atha laṅkāyāḥ dvāra deśam upāgataḥ
viditaḥ rākṣasa indrasya praviveśa gata vyathaḥ
madhye rākṣasa koṭīnām bahvīnām su mahā balaḥ
śuśubhe megha mālābhiḥ ādityaḥ iva saṃvṛtaḥ
sa samāsādya paulastyam amātyaiḥ abhisaṃvṛtam
rāma saṃdeśam āmantrya vāgmī vaktum pracakrame

original: 03,268.010a āha tvāṃ rāghavo rājan kosalendro mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: āha tvām rāghavaḥ rājan kosala indraḥ mahā yaśāḥ

original: 03,268.010c prāptakālam idaṃ vākyaṃ tad ādatsva kuruṣva ca
analyzed: prāpta kālam idam vākyam tat ādatsva kuruṣva ca
akṛtātmānam āsādya rājānam anaye ratam

original: 03,268.011c vinaśyanty anayāviṣṭā deśāś ca nagarāṇi ca
analyzed: vinaśyanti anayā āviṣṭāḥ deśāḥ ca nagarāṇi ca
tvayā ekena aparāddham me sītām āharatā balāt
vadhāya anaparāddhānām anyeṣām tat bhaviṣyati
ye tvayā bala darpābhyām āviṣṭena vanecarāḥ

original: 03,268.013c ṛṣayo hiṃsitāḥ pūrvaṃ devāś cāpy avamānitāḥ
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ hiṃsitāḥ pūrvam devāḥ ca api avamānitāḥ

original: 03,268.014a rājarṣayaś ca nihatā rudantyaś cāhṛtāḥ striyaḥ
analyzed: rājarṣayaḥ ca nihatāḥ rudantyaḥ ca āhṛtāḥ striyaḥ

original: 03,268.014c tad idaṃ samanuprāptaṃ phalaṃ tasyānayasya te
analyzed: tat idam samanuprāptam phalam tasya ānayasya te

original: 03,268.015a hantāsmi tvāṃ sahāmātyaṃ yudhyasva puruṣo bhava
analyzed: hantāsmi tvām saha amātyam yudhyasva puruṣaḥ bhava

original: 03,268.015c paśya me dhanuṣo vīryaṃ mānuṣasya niśācara
analyzed: paśya me dhanuṣaḥ vīryam mānuṣasya niśācara

original: 03,268.016a mucyatāṃ jānakī sītā na me mokṣyasi karhi cit
analyzed: mucyatām jānakī sītā na me mokṣyasi karhi cit

original: 03,268.016c arākṣasam imaṃ lokaṃ kartāsmi niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: arākṣasam imam lokam kartāsmi niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 03,268.017a iti tasya bruvāṇasya dūtasya paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: iti tasya bruvāṇasya dūtasya paruṣam vacaḥ

original: 03,268.017c śrutvā na mamṛṣe rājā rāvaṇaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ
analyzed: śrutvā na mamṛṣe rājā rāvaṇaḥ krodha mūrchitaḥ
iṅgita jñāḥ tatas bhartuḥ catvāraḥ rajanīcarāḥ

original: 03,268.018c caturṣv aṅgeṣu jagṛhuḥ śārdūlam iva pakṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: caturṣu aṅgeṣu jagṛhuḥ śārdūlam iva pakṣiṇaḥ
tān tathā aṅgeṣu saṃsaktān aṅgadaḥ rajanīcarān
ādāya eva kham utpatya prāsāda talam āviśat
vegena utpatataḥ tasya petuḥ te rajanīcarāḥ
bhuvi saṃbhinna hṛdayāḥ prahāra paripīḍitāḥ

original: 03,268.021a sa mukto harmyaśikharāt tasmāt punar avāpatat
analyzed: sa muktaḥ harmya śikharāt tasmāt punar avāpatat
laṅghayitvā purīm laṅkām sva balasya samīpatas
kosala indram atha abhyetya sarvam āvedya ca aṅgadaḥ
viśaśrāma sa tejasvī rāghaveṇa abhinanditaḥ
tatas sarva abhisāreṇa harīṇām vāta raṃhasām
bhedayām āsa laṅkāyāḥ prākāram raghunandanaḥ
vibhīṣaṇa ṛkṣa adhipatī puraskṛtya atha lakṣmaṇaḥ
dakṣiṇam nagara dvāram avāmṛdnāt durāsadam
karabha aruṇa gātrāṇām harīṇām yuddha śālinām
koṭī śata sahasreṇa laṅkām abhyapatat tadā
pralamba bāhu ūru kara jaṅghā antara vilambinām
ṛkṣāṇām dhūmra varṇānām tisraḥ koṭyaḥ vyavasthitāḥ

original: 03,268.026a utpatadbhiḥ patadbhiś ca nipatadbhiś ca vānaraiḥ
analyzed: utpatadbhiḥ patadbhiḥ ca nipatadbhiḥ ca vānaraiḥ
na adṛśyata tadā sūryaḥ rajasā nāśita prabhaḥ
śāli prasūna sadṛśaiḥ śirīṣa kusuma prabhaiḥ
taruṇa āditya sadṛśaiḥ śara gauraiḥ ca vānaraiḥ

original: 03,268.028a prākāraṃ dadṛśus te tu samantāt kapilīkṛtam
analyzed: prākāram dadṛśuḥ te tu samantāt kapilīkṛtam
rākṣasāḥ vismitāḥ rājan sa strī vṛddhāḥ samantataḥ
bibhiduḥ te maṇi stambhān karṇa aṭṭa śikharāṇi ca
bhagna unmathita vegāni yantrāṇi ca vicikṣipuḥ
parigṛhya śataghnīḥ ca sa cakrāḥ sa huḍa upalāḥ
cikṣipuḥ bhuja vegena laṅkā madhye mahā balāḥ

original: 03,268.031a prākārasthāś ca ye ke cin niśācaragaṇās tadā
analyzed: prākāra sthāḥ ca ye ke cit niśācara gaṇāḥ tadā
pradudruvuḥ te śataśas kapibhiḥ samabhidrutāḥ
tatas tu rāja vacanāt rākṣasāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
niryayuḥ vikṛta ākārāḥ sahasra śata saṃghaśas
śastra varṣāṇi varṣantaḥ drāvayantaḥ vanaukasaḥ

original: 03,268.033c prākāraṃ śodhayantas te paraṃ vikramam āsthitāḥ
analyzed: prākāram śodhayantaḥ te param vikramam āsthitāḥ
sa māṣa rāśi sadṛśaiḥ babhūva kṣaṇadā caraiḥ
kṛtaḥ nirvānaraḥ bhūyas prākāraḥ bhīma darśanaiḥ
petuḥ śūla vibhinna aṅgāḥ bahavaḥ vānara ṛṣabhāḥ
stambha toraṇa bhagnāḥ ca petuḥ tatra niśācarāḥ

original: 03,268.036a keśākeśy abhavad yuddhaṃ rakṣasāṃ vānaraiḥ saha
analyzed: keśākeśī abhavat yuddham rakṣasām vānaraiḥ saha

original: 03,268.036c nakhair dantaiś ca vīrāṇāṃ khādatāṃ vai parasparam
analyzed: nakhaiḥ dantaiḥ ca vīrāṇām khādatām vai parasparam
niṣṭanantaḥ hi ubhayatas tatra vānara rākṣasāḥ

original: 03,268.037c hatā nipatitā bhūmau na muñcanti parasparam
analyzed: hatāḥ nipatitāḥ bhūmau na muñcanti parasparam

original: 03,268.038a rāmas tu śarajālāni vavarṣa jalado yathā
analyzed: rāmaḥ tu śara jālāni vavarṣa jaladaḥ yathā

original: 03,268.038c tāni laṅkāṃ samāsādya jaghnus tān rajanīcarān
analyzed: tāni laṅkām samāsādya jaghnuḥ tān rajanīcarān

original: 03,269.008c tuṇḍena ca nalas tatra paṭuśaḥ panasena ca

original: 03,269.012c indrajic cāpi saumitriṃ bibheda bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 03,269.013a vibhīṣaṇaḥ prahastaṃ ca prahastaś ca vibhīṣaṇam
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇaḥ prahastam ca prahastaḥ ca vibhīṣaṇam

analyzed: vivyathuḥ sakalāḥ yena trayaḥ lokāḥ cara acarāḥ

gadayā tāḍayām āsa vinadya raṇa karkaśaḥ

na akampata mahā bāhuḥ himavān iva su sthiraḥ
tatas pragṛhya vipulām śata ghaṇṭām vibhīṣaṇaḥ
abhimantrya mahā śaktim cikṣepa asya śiraḥ prati
patantyā sa tayā vegāt śani nādayā
hṛta uttamāṅgaḥ dadṛśe vāta rugṇaḥ iva drumaḥ

original: 03,270.004d*1280_02 papāta rakṣaḥ sahasā vātarugṇa iva drumaḥ

original: 03,270.005a taṃ dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ saṃkhye prahastaṃ kṣaṇadācaram

original: 03,270.007a tatas tān sahasā dīrṇān dṛṣṭvā vānarapuṃgavān
analyzed: tatas tān sahasā dīrṇān dṛṣṭvā vānara puṃgavān

original: 03,270.009a tataḥ śabdo mahān āsīt tumulo lomaharṣaṇaḥ

rāma rāvaṇa sainyānām anyonyam abhidhāvatām

original: 03,270.010c dhūmrākṣaḥ kapisainyaṃ tad drāvayām āsa patribhiḥ
analyzed: dhūmrākṣaḥ kapi sainyam tat drāvayām āsa patribhiḥ

tayoḥ yuddham abhūt ghoram hari rākṣasa vīrayoḥ
jigīṣatoḥ yudhā anyonyam indra prahlādayoḥ iva

original: 03,270.013a gadābhiḥ parighaiś caiva rākṣaso jaghnivān kapim
analyzed: gadābhiḥ parighaiḥ ca eva rākṣasaḥ jaghnivān kapim

original: 03,270.013c kapiś ca jaghnivān rakṣaḥ saskandhaviṭapair drumaiḥ

original: 03,270.013d*1281_01 śirasy abhyahanat pūrvaṃ kālayā ca punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: śirasi abhyahanat pūrvam kālayā ca punar punar
tṛṇa rājena mahatā loha sārathi bhedinā
tatas tam atikāyena sa aśvam sa ratha sārathim
dhūmrākṣam avadhīt dhīmān hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
vegena mahatā āviṣṭaḥ rākṣasānām mahat balam
yodhayām āsa rāja indra śilā varṣaiḥ samantataḥ

original: 03,270.015a tatas taṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā dhūmrākṣaṃ rākṣasottamam
analyzed: tatas tam nihatam dṛṣṭvā dhūmrākṣam rākṣasa uttamam
harayaḥ jāta visrambhāḥ jaghnuḥ abhyetya sainikān
te vadhyamānāḥ balibhiḥ haribhiḥ jita kāśibhiḥ

te bhipatya puram bhagnāḥ hata śeṣāḥ niśācarāḥ
sarvam rājñe yathāvṛttam rāvaṇāya nyavedayan

original: 03,270.018a śrutvā tu rāvaṇas tebhyaḥ prahastaṃ nihataṃ yudhi
analyzed: śrutvā tu rāvaṇaḥ tebhyaḥ prahastam nihatam yudhi
dhūmrākṣam ca mahā iṣvāsam sa sainyam vānara ṛṣabhaiḥ
su dīrgham iva niḥśvasya samutpatya varāsanāt
uvāca kumbhakarṇasya karma kālaḥ yam āgataḥ

original: 03,270.020a ity evam uktvā vividhair vāditraiḥ sumahāsvanaiḥ
analyzed: iti evam uktvā vividhaiḥ vāditraiḥ su mahā svanaiḥ
śayānam ati nidrālum kumbhakarṇam abodhayat
prabodhya mahatā ca enam yatnena āgata sādhvasaḥ
svastham āsīnam avyagram vinidram rākṣasa adhipaḥ
tatas bravīt daśagrīvaḥ kumbhakarṇam mahā balam

original: 03,270.022a dhanyo 'si yasya te nidrā kumbhakarṇeyam īdṛśī

original: 03,270.022c ya imaṃ dāruṇaṃ kālaṃ na jānīṣe mahābhayam

original: 03,270.023a eṣa tīrtvārṇavaṃ rāmaḥ setunā haribhiḥ saha

original: 03,270.023c avamanyeha naḥ sarvān karoti kadanaṃ mahat

original: 03,270.024c tāṃ mokṣayiṣur āyāto baddhvā setuṃ mahārṇave

original: 03,270.025a tena caiva prahastādir mahān naḥ svajano hataḥ
analyzed: tena ca eva prahasta ādiḥ mahān naḥ sva janaḥ hataḥ

original: 03,270.025c tasya nānyo nihantāsti tvad ṛte śatrukarśana

original: 03,270.026a sa daṃśito 'bhiniryāya tvam adya balināṃ vara
analyzed: sa daṃśitaḥ bhiniryāya tvam adya balinām vara

original: 03,270.026c rāmādīn samare sarvāñ jahi śatrūn ariṃdama
analyzed: rāma ādīn samare sarvām jahi śatrūn ariṃdama

original: 03,270.027c tau tvāṃ balena mahatā sahitāv anuyāsyataḥ
analyzed: tau tvām balena mahatā sahitau anuyāsyataḥ

original: 03,270.029a tathety uktvā tu tau vīrau rāvaṇaṃ dūṣaṇānujau

original: 03,271.001c apaśyat kapisainyaṃ taj jitakāśy agrataḥ sthitam
analyzed: apaśyat kapi sainyam tat jitakāśī agratas sthitam

original: 03,271.002e karajair atudaṃś cānye vihāya bhayam uttamam

original: 03,271.004a sa tāḍyamānaḥ prahasan bhakṣayām āsa vānarān
analyzed: sa tāḍyamānaḥ prahasan bhakṣayām āsa vānarān

original: 03,271.004c panasaṃ ca gavākṣaṃ ca vajrabāhuṃ ca vānaram

original: 03,271.006a taṃ tāram uccaiḥ krośantam anyāṃś ca hariyūthapān
analyzed: tam tāram uccais krośantam anyān ca hari yūthapān

original: 03,271.008c bibheda śālaṃ sugrīvo na caivāvyathayat kapiḥ
analyzed: bibheda śālam sugrīvaḥ na ca eva avyathayat kapiḥ
tatas vinadya prahasam śāla sparśa vibodhitaḥ
dorbhyām ādāya sugrīvam kumbhakarṇaḥ harat balāt
hriyamāṇam tu sugrīvam kumbhakarṇena rakṣasā
gacchan saṃbodhayām āsa prahāreṇa alpa cetasam
tatas saṃlabdha saṃjñaḥ tu hṛtvā karṇa uṣṭa nāsikām
sugrīvaḥ kumbhakarṇasya jagāma hari vāhinīm
atha kruddhaḥ kumbhakarṇaḥ miśritān hari rākṣasān

original: 03,271.010b*1284_05 bhakṣayām āsa balavān mamarda padayor api
analyzed: bhakṣayām āsa balavān mamarda padayoḥ api
bhakṣyamāṇān harīn sarvān kumbhakarṇena rakṣasā
avekṣya abhyadravat vīraḥ saumitriḥ mitra nandanaḥ

original: 03,271.012a sa tasya dehāvaraṇaṃ bhittvā dehaṃ ca sāyakaḥ

vegena mahatā āviṣṭaḥ tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti ca abravīt
kumbhakarṇaḥ mahā iṣvāsaḥ pragṛhīta śilā āyudhaḥ
abhidudrāva saumitrim udyamya mahatīm śilām

original: 03,271.015a tān apy asya bhujān sarvān pragṛhītaśilāyudhān
analyzed: tān api asya bhujān sarvān pragṛhīta śilā āyudhān

original: 03,271.015c kṣuraiś ciccheda laghv astraṃ saumitriḥ pratidarśayan

tam brahmāstreṇa saumitriḥ dadāha adri caya upamam

mahā aśani vinirdagdhaḥ pādapaḥ ṅkuravān iva

original: 03,271.018c gatāsuṃ patitaṃ bhūmau rākṣasāḥ prādravan bhayāt
analyzed: gatāsum patitam bhūmau rākṣasāḥ prādravan bhayāt

original: 03,271.019a tathā tān dravato yodhān dṛṣṭvā tau dūṣaṇānujau
analyzed: tathā tān dravataḥ yodhān dṛṣṭvā tau dūṣaṇa anujau
avasthāpya atha saumitrim saṃkruddhau abhyadhāvatām

pratijagrāha saumitriḥ vinadya ubhau patatribhiḥ
tatas su tumulam yuddham abhavan loma harṣaṇam
dūṣaṇa anujayoḥ pārtha lakṣmaṇasya ca dhīmataḥ
mahatā śara varṣeṇa rākṣasau saḥ bhyavarṣata

original: 03,271.022c tau cāpi vīrau saṃkruddhāv ubhau tau samavarṣatām
analyzed: tau ca api vīrau saṃkruddhau ubhau tau samavarṣatām

original: 03,271.025a nīlaś ca mahatā grāvṇā dūṣaṇāvarajaṃ hariḥ

pramāthinam abhidrutya pramamātha mahā balaḥ

original: 03,271.027a śataśo nairṛtān vanyā jaghnur vanyāṃś ca nairṛtāḥ

original: 03,271.027c nairṛtās tatra vadhyante prāyaśo na tu vānarāḥ

original: 03,272.001a tataḥ śrutvā hataṃ saṃkhye kumbhakarṇaṃ sahānugam
analyzed: tatas śrutvā hatam saṃkhye kumbhakarṇam saha anugam

original: 03,272.002c jahi rāmam amitraghna sugrīvaṃ ca salakṣmaṇam

original: 03,272.003a tvayā hi mama satputra yaśo dīptam upārjitam
analyzed: tvayā hi mama sat putra yaśaḥ dīptam upārjitam

original: 03,272.004a antarhitaḥ prakāśo vā divyair dattavaraiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: antarhitaḥ prakāśaḥ vā divyaiḥ datta varaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 03,272.004c jahi śatrūn amitraghna mama śastrabhṛtāṃ vara
analyzed: jahi śatrūn amitra ghna mama śastrabhṛtām vara
rāma lakṣmaṇa sugrīvāḥ śara sparśam na te nagha
samarthāḥ pratisaṃsoḍhum kutas tad anuyāyinaḥ
akṛtā yā prahastena kumbhakarṇena ca anagha
kharasya apacitiḥ saṃkhye tām gacchasva mahā bhuja

original: 03,272.007a tvam adya niśitair bāṇair hatvā śatrūn sasainikān
analyzed: tvam adya niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ hatvā śatrūn sa sainikān

original: 03,272.007c pratinandaya māṃ putra purā baddhveva vāsavam
analyzed: pratinandaya mām putra purā baddhvā iva vāsavam

original: 03,272.008a ity uktaḥ sa tathety uktvā ratham āsthāya daṃśitaḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ sa tathā iti uktvā ratham āsthāya daṃśitaḥ

original: 03,272.008c prayayāv indrajid rājaṃs tūrṇam āyodhanaṃ prati
analyzed: prayayau indrajit rājan tūrṇam āyodhanam prati

original: 03,272.010a taṃ lakṣmaṇo 'py abhyadhāvat pragṛhya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
analyzed: tam lakṣmaṇaḥ pi abhyadhāvat pragṛhya sa śaram dhanuḥ
trāsayan tala ghoṣeṇa siṃhaḥ kṣudra mṛgam yathā

divya astra viduṣoḥ tīvram anyonya spardhinoḥ tadā

original: 03,272.012a rāvaṇis tu yadā nainaṃ viśeṣayati sāyakaiḥ

analyzed: vajram praviśya śakrasya yat kṛtam tat ca te śrutam

original: 03,299.016a hutāśanena yac cāpaḥ praviśya channam āsatā
analyzed: hutāśanena yat ca apaḥ praviśya channam āsatā

original: 03,299.016c vibudhānāṃ kṛtaṃ karma tac ca sarvaṃ śrutaṃ tvayā
analyzed: vibudhānām kṛtam karma tat ca sarvam śrutam tvayā
evam vivasvatā tāta channena uttama tejasā

original: 03,299.017c nirdagdhāḥ śatravaḥ sarve vasatā bhuvi sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: nirdagdhāḥ śatravaḥ sarve vasatā bhuvi sarvaśas

original: 03,299.018a viṣṇunā vasatā cāpi gṛhe daśarathasya vai
analyzed: viṣṇunā vasatā ca api gṛhe daśarathasya vai
daśagrīvaḥ hataḥ channam saṃyuge bhīma karmaṇā

original: 03,299.019a evam ete mahātmānaḥ pracchannās tatra tatra ha
analyzed: evam ete mahātmānaḥ pracchannāḥ tatra tatra ha

original: 03,299.019c ajayañ śātravān yuddhe tathā tvam api jeṣyasi
analyzed: ajayam śātravān yuddhe tathā tvam api jeṣyasi
tathā dhaumyena dharma jñaḥ vākyaiḥ saṃparitoṣitaḥ

original: 03,299.020c śāstrabuddhyā svabuddhyā ca na cacāla yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
analyzed: śāstra buddhyā sva buddhyā ca na cacāla yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
atha abravīt mahā bāhuḥ bhīmasenaḥ mahā balaḥ
rājānam balinām śreṣṭhaḥ girā saṃpariharṣayan
avekṣayā mahā rāja tava gāṇḍīvadhanvanā

original: 03,299.022c dharmānugatayā buddhyā na kiṃ cit sāhasaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: dharma anugatayā buddhyā na kim cit sāhasam kṛtam

original: 03,299.023a sahadevo mayā nityaṃ nakulaś ca nivāritau
analyzed: sahadevaḥ mayā nityam nakulaḥ ca nivāritau
śaktau vidhvaṃsane teṣām śatrughnau bhīma vikramau

original: 03,299.024a na vayaṃ tat prahāsyāmo yasmin yokṣyati no bhavān
analyzed: na vayam tat prahāsyāmaḥ yasmin yokṣyati naḥ bhavān

original: 03,299.024c bhavān vidhattāṃ tat sarvaṃ kṣipraṃ jeṣyāmahe parān
analyzed: bhavān vidhattām tat sarvam kṣipram jeṣyāmahe parān
iti ukte bhīmasenena brāhmaṇāḥ parama āśiṣaḥ

original: 03,299.025c prayujyāpṛcchya bharatān yathāsvān svān yayur gṛhān
analyzed: prayujya āpṛcchya bharatān yathāsvān svān yayuḥ gṛhān

original: 03,299.026a sarve vedavido mukhyā yatayo munayas tathā
analyzed: sarve veda vidaḥ mukhyāḥ yatayaḥ munayaḥ tathā
āśīḥ uktvā yathānyāyam punar darśana kāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: 03,299.027a saha dhaumyena vidvāṃsas tathā te pañca pāṇḍavāḥ
analyzed: saha dhaumyena vidvāṃsaḥ tathā te pañca pāṇḍavāḥ

original: 03,299.027c utthāya prayayur vīrāḥ kṛṣṇām ādāya bhārata
analyzed: utthāya prayayuḥ vīrāḥ kṛṣṇām ādāya bhārata
krośa mātram atikramya tasmāt deśāt nimittataḥ
śvobhūte manuja vyāghrāḥ channa vāsa artham udyatāḥ
pṛthak śāstra vidaḥ sarve sarve mantra viśāradāḥ
saṃdhi vigraha kāla jñāḥ mantrāya samupāviśan
